Package org.fcrepo.utilities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Base64
    Base-64 utility methods.
    DateUtility
    A collection of utility methods for performing frequently required tasks.
    DriverShim
    Allows one to load a JDBC driver at runtime.
    ExecUtility
    Utility class for executing commands and sending the command's output to a given OutputStream.
    FileComparator
    Comparator for sorting files and directories in a deterministic manner.
    FileUtils  
    Foxml11Document
    A DOM-based utility for generating FOXML 1.1 documents.
    LogConfig
    Logger configuration utility methods.
    MimeTypeUtils
    MimeTypeUtils provides the fileExtensionForMIMEType() method, which converts a MIME type to a file extension.
    NamespaceContextImpl
    An implementation of NamespaceContext that provides an addNamespace method.
    NormalizedURI
    A representation of a normalized URI, per RFC3986.
    StreamReaderThread  
    XMLDocument  
    XmlSerializer
    A utility class for XML serialization.
    XmlTransformUtility  
    Zip
    Zip and GZip utilities.
